name: alchemy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of chemistry, especially in the Middle Ages, that dealt with trying to find a way to change ordinary metals into gold and with trying to find a medicine that would cure any disease
literary a process that is so effective that it seems like magic: She manages, by some extraordinary alchemy, to turn the most ordinary of ingredients into the most delicious of dishes.
